# (U) CLASSIFICATION GUIDE TITLE/NUMBER: Cuban Missile Crisis, 10-18 ## (U) PUBLICATION DATE: 30 July 2008 ## (U) OFFICE OF ORIGIN: Information Security Policy, DJP2 ## (U//FOUO) POC: DJP2 ## (U) PHONE ## (U) ORIGINAL CLASSIFICATION AUTHORITY: Associate Director for Community Integration, Policy and Records ## (U) Unless otherwise indicated, the information included in this guide addresses activity during and related to the Cuban Missile Crisis ONLY. | Description of Information | Classification/Markings | Reason | Decline | Remarks | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | (U) The following guidance (items 1-8) pertains to information related to the Cuban Missile Crisis during the time period 1 January 1959 through 31 December 1963. | | | | | | 1. (U) The fact that the following entities were SIGINT targets during and related to the crisis:
a. The USSR
b. Soviet Forces in Cuba
c. Soviet Merchant
Shipping
d. Cuba, to include Cuban
Military Forces. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | 2. (U) Information derived from, or pertaining to, unenciphered Soviet military communications during and related to the crisis. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | 3. (U) Information derived from, or pertaining to, Soviet air-toground and ground-to-air GCI communications in Cuba during and related to the crisis. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | 4. (U) Direction-finding results when applied to Cuban and Soviet Forces during and related to the crisis, to include merchant shipping involved in aid to Cuba. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | 5. (U) Information derived from, | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | |

| or pertaining to, unenciphered
Cuban internal military and

during and related to the crisis. | | | | | | :-- | :-- | :-- | :-- | :-- | | 6. (U) Information derived from

ground and ground-to-air GCI

Cuban internal military and
governmental communications
during and related to the crisis. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | (U) The following guidance (items 9-10) pertains to information related to the Cuban Missile Crisis during the time period 1 January 1960 through 31 December 1962. | 9. (U) The fact that
Czechoslovakia was a SIGINT
target during and related to the
crisis. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | :-- | :-- | :-- | :-- | :-- | | 10. (U) Information derived
from, or pertaining to, Czech air
and air defense communications
during and related to the crisis,
and ELINT related to those
communications. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | | | (U) The following guidance (items 11-16) pertains to information related to
the Cuban Missile Crisis for all time periods. | | | | | | 11. (U) The fact of NSA/CSS
targeting/collecting diplomatic
and International Commercial
(ILC) communications during
and related to the crisis. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | (U//FOUO) Details
regarding this
targeting/collection shall
remain classified, to
include identification of
the specific diplomatic
entity communicating or
identification of the entity
communicating using ILC
communications. | | | | | | (U//FOUO) Information
from product reports
derived from diplomatic
and ILC communications
shall not be released
without approval from the
Office of Policy and |

| | | | | Records. | | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | :--: | | 12. (S//REL) The fact of targeting Soviet General Staff communications. | SECRET//

- by ELNOT (ELINT notation), or
- by nickname, or
- by identification of the associated system. | UNCLASSIFIED | N/A | N/A | (U) The association of an ELNOT with its related system nickname or other system identifier is classified. | | 20. # SECRET//REL TO USA, AUS, CAN, GBR, NZL 

(U) * 25 years: Declassification in 25 years indicates that the information is classified for 25 years from the date a document is created or 25 years from the date of this original classification decision, whichever is later.
